questions.question: Which controller/action allows to render a template without a specific controller?

answers.value:
acme_privacy:
       path:         /privacy
       controller:   Symfony\Bundle\FrameworkBundle\Controller\TemplateController
       defaults:
           action: static/privacy.html.twig

acme_privacy:
       path:         /privacy
       controller:   Symfony\Bundle\FrameworkBundle\Controller\TemplateController
       defaults:
           render: static/privacy.html.twig

acme_privacy:
        path:         /privacy
        controller:   Symfony\Bundle\FrameworkBundle\Controller\TemplateController
        defaults:
            template: static/privacy.html.twig

questions.question: What is the LoggerInterface correct namespace?
Using Symfony\Component\ErrorHandler\Debug static class, what is the only method available?
Using Symfony\Component\ErrorHandler\ErrorHandler static class, what is the only method available?

answers.value: public static function enable(self $handler = null, bool $replace = true)
public static function create(self $handler = null, bool $replace = true)
public static function load(self $handler = null, bool $replace = true)
public static function start(self $handler = null, bool $replace = true)
public static function register(self $handler = null, bool $replace = true)
